[Inset Pipes:Pipes]
ld=Inset Pipe WS
lu=Inset Pipe WN
rd=Inset Pipe ES
ru=Inset Pipe EN
vertical=Vertical Inset Pipe
horizontal=Horizontal Inset Pipe
allowJunctions=true
tr=Inset Pipe TJunct E
tu=Inset Pipe TJunct N
tl=Inset Pipe TJunct W
td=Inset Pipe TJunct S
x=Inset Pipe XJunct
placeCaps=false
capRight=Inset Pipe Inwards E
capUp=Inset Pipe Inwards S
capLeft=Inset Pipe Inwards W
capDown=Inset Pipe Inwards N
